PERSONA:
meet alex, a 25-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region. he comes from a lower-income family, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. alex has some college education but no degree. 

despite his youth, alex holds conservative political views and identifies as a republican. he is an atheist and has never been affiliated with any religion, seldom attending religious services. alex is a frequent internet user, being almost constantly online.

currently single and having never been married, he was born and raised in the united states. alex is not registered to vote at his current address, though he is a u.s. citizen. he doesn't engage in volunteerism or community service activities.

overall, alex is a young, white, conservative man from the south who is tech-savvy and focused on his career and personal life rather than civic engagement or religious affiliations.
